page.title: 11Family Life.
page.content: There are five people in Catherine's family:mum,dad,Ben,Jonathon and Catherine.One Sunday they all got up at 6.30a.m. for a day out on the Isle Of Wight.They left home at about 7.00 a.m. and drove to Southhampton to catch a ferry to the island.While on the island they visited Black Gang Chine where there are some large model dinasaurs and had lunch in a cliff top cafe. After lunch they went to the beach and then to a fair.After having afternoon tea in another cafe they left to drive home. During the week, dad gets up at 7 a and goes to work at the printers.The children get up at 8 a.m and go to sch ool at 8.45.Mum stays at home to do th e housework and sometimes helps at the school.After school Jonathon practices the piano and they have tea when dad arrives at about 6 0'clock.
